overview: The friendship is long over, and now all that's left is for welterweight stars Jorge Masvidal and Colby Covington to settle their score in the main event of UFC 272 on Saturday, March 5 at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas. It's been a grudge match years in the making, and finally, the BMF champ will get his opportunity to end his feud with "Chaos" Covington once and for all in the Octagon. UFC 272: Covington vs Masvidal - Saturday, March 5th live from T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas, NV  170 lbs.: Colby Covington vs. Jorge Masvidal  160 lbs.: Rafael dos Anjos vs. Renato Moicano (not Rafael Fiziev)  145 lbs.: Edson Barboza vs. Bryce Mitchell  170 lbs.: Kevin Holland vs. Alex Oliveira  265 lbs.: Greg Hardy vs. Serghei Spivac
title: UFC 272: Covington vs. Masvidal
